resources:
ByeON Laine Yeoran Kim SKIP Upload Setting About ABOUT
"* How to use the app
" " - In 'Upload' menu, upload your beloved pet's photo to share with others. 
" " - You'll receive notification of random pictures of other's deceased lovely pets. 
" " - In 'Setting' menu, you can adjust notification options.
" " - Grief and miss together. 
" "
"
"* Source - All clip arts are found at clipart-library.com
" " except paw icon from seekpng.com
" "* In memory of the beloved cat Ondung (2007-2020)
" "
"
http://clipart-library.com https://www.seekpng.com Process image
%1$d s How often to get photos None Any Wifi Requires: Device Idle Device Charging Override Deadline: Not set Schedule Notification Send Right Now (Once) Cancel Notification Job Service Your Job ran to completion! Job Service notification Notifications from Job Service Job Scheduled, will run when the constraints are met Please set at least one constraint Jobs Canceled
Please set a periodic interval Notification Setting 1 Hour 4 Hour 8 Hour Once a day Periodic:
channel_1 From Bye-On
